reviews.review_text: The Gucci store in Vancouver was such a pleasure to visit.  This store is large and spacious with a great selection.  The staff was very friendly, helpful, and extremely knowledgeable about their product.  It was nice to see such a large variety of products went beyond the typical brown Gucci print.  They had a good selection clothing, accessories, and shoes.  I loved the furniture as well!

I visited the Gucci store on Georgia St and it s the only luxury store that I felt very comfortable, and warmly welcomed! Special thanks to (Riccardo) for assisting me and providing an excellent customer service experience. I feel very excited for my next time shopping there!

Katerina was helping me find my first pair of Gucci shoes for my Birthday (last year, November) and she was absolutely amazing. Great customer service and she left me a Happy Birthday card in my bag, which I think is a part of great customer service. She definitely has a great products knowledge and helped me choose one of the pairs as I was confused between a couple. My shoes are so comfortable, I can t begin to describe, 100X better than my Yeezys. Fully satisfied with my purchase. Thank you, Katerina!

I order some shoes online and i choose the wrong size so i went today to find a way to get them the right size. I was so happy that even with the moving to the other location they had them. Ricardo was really helpful and kind ,the other 2 woman that was there too. I really enjoy it. For myself it was perfect time service... I usually know what i want or like and dont and Ricardo sence me well because of that i had to came out with a little matching purse. Cant wait to go shopping again.. they are moving to bigger place and amazing selection in few days!
This is a beautiful flagship store with great selection and wonderful staff.  I had a very pleasant experience here with Johnny.  He is knowledgeable and patient and I appreciate his assistance.

I recently visited this Gucci store and I have to say, it was an amazing experience! The staff was extremely friendly and helpful, offering to assist me with any questions I had about the products. The store itself was beautifully designed with a modern and luxurious feel. The selection of products was vast, ranging from accessories and handbags to clothing and footwear. The prices were surprisingly affordable, making it easy to find something that fits my budget. I was able to find some great pieces that I love wearing. Overall, it was a great shopping experience and I would highly recommend the Gucci store to anyone looking for high quality, luxury products.
Ricardo was friendly, knowledgeable and easy to work with. Made dope suggestions and helped me for considerably longer than he probably wanted to lol. Couldnt decide, got both, will be back.

Rare and refreshing are not generally the first things that come to mind when shopping at a luxury boutique. However It was a pleasant surprise, walking into a very different vibe and experience here. The team of SA s were warm, welcoming and engaging with customers as well as assisting one another. I was fortunate enough to have been helped by an amazing SA named Riccardo who really went above and beyond. His charisma, brand knowledge and genuine sincerity really set him apart. He made some great personalized suggestions and brought out some fantastic pieces from just a short conversation. Impeccable attention to detail. Lots of laughs, very enjoyable, zero pressure to commit. Five star service. Will definitely look for him next time.

Exquisite service from Johnny! Came in Friday after work in scuffed, ripped dirty clothing as it was convenient when heading back home to Coquitlam.. I was greeted right away and given VIP treatment despite my image. Very happy with the service, my new wallet and the whole experience! Beautiful Gucci Store! Thank you.

Me and my daughter went to Gucci s new and Beautiful flagship store. Magnificent ambience with friendly staff but Credit goes out to Ricardo. He is funny, nice, friendly and very accommodating. Because of him, I was able to buy my first Branded Sneakers. I want to go back and buy more items  . Gucci is lucky to have him as one of the employees

5 stars. Would give 5000 stars if i could. I went here today w/ my wife and my friend and we had an absolutely fantastic experience. The store itself is now fully renod and worthy to be Canadas flagship Gucci boutique. Our SA Andrea is a true gem. Shes so sweet and genuine that Im blown away that such a magnificent person could work in retail. She went digging in the back for stuff thats my size and im not easy to shop for at all. But she persevered and found some very interesting pieces for me. We will be back for sure. The staff, the new store, the brand itself. Bravo, well done! and kudos to their magnificent staff
Thank you to Ricardo for the help!! Wonderful store and service!
Thank you to the young blonde worker there. He was very helpful, great attitude, and talkative. I wanted to quickly check for a gift but got distracted by his energy! Coming back for sure.
Monika was helping me choosing the nice bag, great service agent   appreciate it!

Great experience. Went there 3 times, and everytime the staff went out of their way to help. The SA Crystal was very helpful and patient. My son was running around, but the person at the door was very attentive and made sure he stays indoor. As a parent thats one less thing to worry about. Next day, I was running late but their engraving specialist waited to talk in person, and stayed back longer than his hours to finalize the customization I wanted. Another day, the manager went out of her way to help me with a parking situation. Very happy with the purchase. Thank you all for making my anniversary gift special. - this location does custom engravings (I was told otherwise by Bloor flagship store) - metered city parking is right in front of the store

A massive thank you to Ivy for making my purchase so easy and hassle free. She posses a superb customer service experience by far. I m so happy with what I bought. She wrap it nicely and very patient waiting for me until I come and collect even thought the store is already close. I ll give her more than 5 stars. Great shopping experience! Thank you so much Ivy. I ll see you again next time!
Super Fashion the store and the employees are super friendly

Went to the store with my friend, the SA named Dean was very friendly even we were just browsing around. He is very passionate and knowledgeable about the brand as well. The store seems small but it has everything. We will definitely come back to Gucci and shop from Dean!

Had an amazing experience at the store! Dean was so friendly and kind! He was very attentive and made sure to give us space as well! Our purchase was very worth it and he packaged our purchase so beautifully! I would come back to this location to purchase more products especially from Dean!

My sales associate was Caio and this was my first time shoping with Gucci. I had awesome experience on Oct 13,2022. I went to buy a gift for my husband and it was a last moment before the store closed down. Caio was so welcoming as he offered us water, which I honestly appreciated. Caio is such a handsome person with a calm personality. I really had a very good experience and want to say Thank you  Caio.
Nice store, Katerina help me looking for a gift with smile and great hospitality!!! Nice experience here

Katerina is the best! She always helps us with our purchases and she is so knowledgeable. A quick text to her and she s there right away to help us out! Looking forward to the new store in the Fairmont!
Amazing service! Went to buy some jewelery. Was helped by Crystal. She is so amazing! Very sweet and full of knowledge best of all her honesty. Will definitely be going to back to this location.

Katerina is the most helpful and truly wonderful selling supervisor Ive ever had the pleasure of meeting. She went above and beyond to help me find a bag and shoes and catered to my every need. She was extremely knowledgable, genuine and thoughtful. All of my future Gucci purchases I will be handling specifically with her. Words cannot express how highly I recommend her. She made my shopping experience absolutely wonderful and she really makes every customer feel valued.
I loved the place! Such a great environment! Erand helped me with everything I needed, he took the experience to the next level!
Awesome Service by Natalie. Exceptional

Always a pleasant experience! Never had one issue coming into this store, always helped right away (and if they are busy someone always comes up and says they ll be with us right away)! ! My wife and I have purchased a lot from here and we will continue to do so! Thank you for the great customer service !
Very good service and left very happy with my purchase
Store was fairly small with only accesories available (no clothes) but theyre opening a new location soon which will fix the problem. Very good service from the sales associate.

This Gucci has been hands down my favourite. I come here all the time. People who are here to help you are amazing. Ricardo in particular is a great man with a great heart. You can tell he loves what he does and is great at it. It s always nice to see such nice people!

Not sure why others reviews depict the  service as poor here. I went there last week to buy a wallet, and the lady that accommodated me was very helpful and easy to talk to. She picked out the best wallet for me and showed me the other products in the store. Overall, it was a very good shopping experience.

First time at a designer store and my experience was so good. I didnt feel judged and stared at as Ive heard other people tell me their stories. I was just wearing shorts haha everyone was so king and knowledgable and helpful. I bought a ring and I went back to exchange it the next day for a smaller size, everyone was so nice. Thank you Matin + the other people who helped me exchange it today! Will be coming back if I ever see something that catches my eye :)
Warmly welcomed and received top service from Ricardo today at their elegant temporary location on Alberni and Thurlow. Even though I only wanted to see a Perfume I felt like a valued customer.
Riccardo was the best! He was very friendly and approachable. He was very knowledgeable about the products as well! Excellent customer service!!!
It was my first time visit today, Dean made it very easy for an online purchase return and exchange! Its a memorable birthday treat for me. Thank you

I really enjoyed my time here. The staff was attentive, not pushy and very informative. Their passion for fashion is palpable and the experience is made even better by the friendliness and sister-like attitude of the staff. Must visit if in Vancouver!

Big applause to Trisha! She demonstrates how excellent customer service can have a lasting effect on customer relationships. My girlfriend & I ordered 2 pairs of sneakers & a bag. Since products werent at the store, Trisha found all these products online & helped us to make an order. She was on the phone with me after hours to notify when products are arriving. I strongly recommend her if you want to buy anything from this store! Thank you again Trisha for your customer service! Alex & Yana.

It was my first time being in the Gucci store and I got Trisha as my SA, and I m very pleased! She s very easy going and friendly. She made the experience a great one. So far loving my new hang bag! I went from being a LV girl to a Gucci girl! Hehe I can t wait to keep adding to my collection.
My first time shopping at Gucci and had a great experience. Sales associate Fatemeh quickly assisted me with a ring I wanted to buy. She was very helpful, kind, and lovely!
Very good service, Erand was amazing and I couldn t be happier with his help and attention.
Incredible service from start to finish. From the gentleman who greeted us at the front door, to our sales person, Monica. She is knowledgeable, helpful and very personable. Highly recommend!
Riccardo was great! We were greeted promptly and politely, tended to our needs and we made our purchase. Will definitely come back for our next purchase and will ask for Riccardo.
I bought a bag yesterday. Thanks to the kind response of Asian female staff, I was able to buy a bag that I liked comfortably Thank you. Im going to buy it again at this store.
Always go to Ricarrdo for any purchases, he is very professional and quick to reply to any texts you send inquiring about an item. I only go to this location because of him, hes very professional.
Andrea was amazing, she made my experience easy and fun!
I just had the best experience at Gucci with Matin. She was very knowledgeable and friendly. She showed us all the options, explained them all and helped me to make an informed decision.
The staff was very knowledgeable and courteous. I didnt feel any pressure to buy anything and all my questions were answered. Pricing is what to be expected, but service was excellent.

As I was from out of town there was no way to exchange within 2 weeks. Maggie one of the workers gave amazing customer service and gave a personal number incase there was any issues with the products fit . I am very impressed with the service and of course the product !
Maggie and Andrea were friendly and very easy to work with, delivered exceptional customer experience. Definitely will see them again in the future.
Brought my Gucci tie for repair after one time use. Asst. Manager Gisella took care of the repair and even mailed it back to me in a week. Great customer service and i will be back!

For bags and shoes this place is good , But my partner prefer the other location, they don t have a decent selection of clothing, so you have to visit the one in located inside holt and Renfrew. Still worth checking out, all the sale reps we have dealt with are good too.

Attentive and knowledgeable associates who treated us kindly and without judgement. Note that this location within the Fairmont actually doesnt receive the same volume as the shop in shop at Holt Renfrew.
Great staff and selection! If you drop in, ask for Andrea - she goes above and beyond for her clients and provides exceptional service and product guidance.

Of course Gucci has high quality products, this is a fact. But the thing that makes this particular store amazing is the way the staff goes over and beyond. That is what makes spending money there even more worth it.

Thank you to the sales associate (I believe her name was Isabella or Gisela) she saved my phone from being stolen from a guy who walked in from the street entrance! He came up behind me and had my phone that I put down so I could look at the belts. My intuition told me not to turn my back on my stuff but I was like Im in Gucci who is going to take my stuff here, lesson learned. Thank you so much Gucci!
Dean is the best SA. Been dealing with him for the last two years. Really helpful!
Fantastic service from Riccardo !!! Will be dealing with this store just cause of him . Thanks for going above and beyond. Cheers

The service is 100x better than the one we have here in Calgary,I called to get a replacement box for my clutch I bought a while ago and because we moved,the box was damaged.The lady I spoke to was very helpful,fully listened to what I need and I didnt have a hard time talking with her.I got the replacement box yesterday in the mail and Im ultimately happy with their customer service.To add,I was very pleased with the note that Lee sent with the box.How ironic that the store in my city wouldnt lift a finger to do what these guys in Vancouver did!Definitely turned my experience!
First class service!!! The store is huge with a great selection of clothes and handbags.
Dean was very helpful and friendly.  I would highly recommend him for any of your product needs.
Beautiful things to buy i was served by Caio Job well done

First time in a Gucci store and bought my first Gucci sneakers, my experience was amazing, they were very helpful and welcoming they were pretty busy that day but I was still accommodated like a high baller LOL

first time going to the gucci store workers were very helpful with my purchase of my gucci belt and wallet very friendly gave me some gucci chocolates and ice cold water free gucci books and shoe horn helped me for the 3 and a half hours i was in the store no complaints whatsoever personally louis vuitton workers were outstanding and VERY VERY helpful  id say more helpful and more emotion to them then gucci very engaging and totally cool with a 19 yearold going around all excited touching everything hahaha and they talked to me more so like i was a normal person i liked that more then at gucci when they would almost bring there self lower, like i was much much better then them but its all gucci fam

Wonderful experience, amazing staff, went in to buy a wallet and was treated like royalty the entire time, got a free water for waiting around, offered a seat, tried on a load of clothing and got the wallet I wanted, best service Ive ever received. Gucci gang GOAT
Have been shopping here for years and consistently receive great service. Andrea is a pleasure to deal with!
Big shout out to Dean, very knowledgeable and helped me find the shoes I was looking everywhere for.
Fantastic store.  Ask for Maggie she is very helpful without being pushy or arrogant like some of the other staff there.
Awesome collection for people who love their luxuries n brands ...monika was our sales person and she has best products n advices for a persons particular taste and needs.
They gave me sparkling water since I bought more than one item. Amazing service!

I absolutely love the Gucci sore in the vancouver hotel! I purchased a pair of sunglasses and a pair of runners and I walked out very happy that I spoiled myself I dont do this as much as I would like but you have to enjoy life every one in a while.see you this summer Gucci
Returning 6 items, had to wait a bit due to COVID 19 but excellent service at our visit
Great service! Staff were quick to help and were able to check items not on display
I never visited this store but apparently my phone has. So good for you, phone. Next time take a picture.
better location than the one at the hotel but still both great places to shop. I tend to stop here first.
They treat you like royalty. Just dont buy the snake bags
I came here last week to purchase a sneaker. I got very impressed how amazing and professional they are.
Brian helped me out, he was amazing on every level! Will be back there soon for sure!
Very nice people, a salesperson also helped me to water lol
Erand was so lovely and helpful. Thanks
The staff are accommodating. Shout-out to Katerina for helping us out.
Ours sales associate was so lovely and nice, 10/10 experience.
Their nice and welcoming staff are overwhelming Their bags are peerless Thanks for your service
Better than the one at Pacific Centre. Good selection, ok service.
Just went in to buy a belt,staff was non judgemental le,friendly nice conversations.
Very knowledgeable staff, clean, professional, elegant; everything you would expect from Gucci.
Friendly and Helpful staff ,Great shopping experience . Will keep collecting Gucci !!
A very high quality store and a very friendly customer service.
Trisha is amazing ask for her. Very thorough and very polite.
All of the sales associates here were friendly and helpful!
Friendly staff. Black and red Gucci bags look really nice
Excellent,personnalized service! Great experience.
The sales associate was very friendly and helpful
Helpful staff, beautiful store- great service!
Awesome place. Good collection. Friendly staff.
Amazing service, was helped by Mickey, grace personified.
They know how to take care of you and your bags!
Look for Andrea! Best customer experience with her.
Nice stufff but things I need to work towards
great service and experience would be back.
Go see Trisha, shes the best.
